text: Le Puy-en-Velay is a commune. It is found in the Haute-Loire department in the south of France. Le Puy-Kathedrale-04-2001-gje.jpg Le Puy-Kathedrale-14-Kreuzgang-2001-gje.jpg Espaly-Saint-Marcel-06-Burg-2001-gje.jpg Le Puy-16-Madonna-2001-gje.jpg Le Puy-28-Treppe-2001-gje.jpg Le Puy-Saint-Michel-04-2001-gje.jpg Le Puy-Saint- Michel-16-innen-2001-gje.jpg ==Sister cities== Le-Puy-en-Velay is twinned with: * Meschede, Germany * Tonbridge, United Kingdom * Tortosa, Spain * Brugherio, Italy * Mangualde, Portugal Category:Communes in Haute-Loire Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Le Puy-en-Velay
